sentence.text: Large-scale tumor sequencing has revolutionized the identification of somatic driver alterations but has had limited impact on the identification of cancer predisposition genes (CPGs).

Applied to ~10,000 tumor exomes the approach identifies known and putative CPGs - including the chromatin modifier NSD1 -Â that contribute to cancer through a combination of rare germline variants and somatic loss-of-heterozygosity (LOH).
